price: 14.  Ne connaîtrait-Il pas ceux qu’Il a créés quand Il est le Subtil et le parfaitement Informé ?
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
